title: Which language does Sean Paul used in Rockabye song? - Quora

response.answer_text: He uses English. It's just the way he says it that it sounds wierd. Here is only the rap part. Single mom what you doing out there?Facing the hard life without no fear Just see and know that you really care'Cause any obstacle come you well preparedAnd no mamma you never shed tear'Cause you haffi set things year after yearAnd you give the youth love beyond compareYou find the school fee and the bus fareHmmmm more when paps disappearIn a wrong bar can't find him nowhereSteadily you work flow, heavily you know so you nah stopNo time no time fi a jeer If this looks wierd just watch the video.

Sean Paul is a Jamaican rapper, singer, producer, and actor. He raps in Jamaican language, which is an English based language with West African influences. In ‘Rockabye’ song too, Sean Paul ‘toasts’ in Jamaican. Hope this helps. :)
